subject: Re: [junit] How to get developers to test - FOR SOFTWARE MANAGERS ONLY!!!
msgSnippet: ... Promotion is nature s way to remove incompetence from the productive process. Regards, Lothar
messageBody:
albsavoia schrieb:
>
> If you are just a measly developer, please stop reading here and get
> back to work. This post is for the hard and conscientious workers
> who achieved the rank of managers (i.e. people like your boss).
> Work hard and smart and, one day, you too might be a manager.

Promotion is nature's way to remove incompetence from the
productive process.


Regards, Lothar
